Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Beta-defensin 12 (BD-12, mBD-12; Defensin, beta 12; Rodents, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Only expressed in epididymis (caput, corpus and cauda).

Literature.Title: Identification of multiple novel epididymis-specific beta-defensin isoforms in humans and mice.

Literature.Title: The transcriptional landscape of the mammalian genome.

Literature.Title: Identification on mouse chromosome 8 of new beta-defensin genes with regionally specific expression in the male reproductive organ.
